sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './basketItem.css' const BasketItem = props => { const { item, removeFromBasket, addToBasket } = props const { title, image, price, id } = item return ( <>
{title}
quantity
{price}
removeFromBasket(id)} class="fa fa-close"> addToBasket(id)} class="fa fa-shopping-cart">
) } export default BasketItem;
